backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining KYC, withdrawals, payout methods, gift card rates, rate quotes, and authorization/storage mixins with mutable state and CRUD-style methods.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module transforming old actor state into new actor state by adding withdrawal timing config while preserving existing maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs for withdrawal timing updates and admin error surfacing.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of various frontend utility files, pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/BUILD_DEPLOY_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide covering build and deployment steps, required tools, environment variables, and troubleshooting tips.
frontend/docs/betting-topup-video-checkl: Checklist documenting required UI, logic, validations, and states for the betting top-up flow implementation.
frontend/docs/crypto-wallet-dashboard-ch: Checklist detailing all UI sections, components, and state behaviors needed for the crypto wallet dashboard.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme and variables defining light/dark color tokens, layout rules, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component setting up routing and authentication flows including registration, profile setup, and protected pages.
frontend/src/backend-augment.d.ts: TypeScript declaration merge adding authorization-related backend methods to the generated interface.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Guard component that checks admin status and blocks access with a message if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/admin/CoinPriceI: Admin UI for viewing and updating the global coin price index with direction indicators and validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthInitial: Fullscreen loading view shown while Internet Identity initializes.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginCard.t: Login and signup UI integrating Internet Identity with error handling and basic form visuals.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoAct: Renders a single crypto transaction row with icon, timestamp, amount, and status badge.
Loads and displays crypto-related transactions with tabs for filtering and realtime updates.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoDas: Displays the crypto dashboard header with balance visibility toggle and market rate indicator.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoQui: Renders quick action buttons for crypto operations like send, receive, buy, swap, and send to bank.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoTok: Shows a list of crypto assets with icons, balances, and optional click handling.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Bu: Bottom sheet for buying crypto, validating input and logging a local pending transaction.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Re: Bottom sheet for selecting an asset, copying a mock address, and creating a receive transaction.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Se: Bottom sheet for sending crypto by specifying asset, address, and amount, then creating a pending transaction.
Bottom sheet workflow for withdrawing funds to a bank, managing payout methods and confirming withdrawals.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Sw: Bottom sheet UI for swapping crypto assets with validation and local transaction creation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Promotional dashboard card with illustration, text, and pager dots.
Clickable dashboard shortcut tile with icon, label, optional badge, and coming-soon state.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/GiftCa: Row button displaying a gift card brand with fallback icon handling.
Renders gift card label chips with optional count overflow.
Editor for adding, removing, and saving custom gift card labels.
Filter bar allowing selection and clearing of gift card labels via popover and chips.
Card displaying NGN rate tiers for a gift card brand.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/NGNRat: Inline summary showing matched NGN rate tier or unavailable message.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/Select: Bottom sheet picker for searching and selecting gift card brands.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryT: Renders a transaction row with icon, timestamp, amount formatting, and status badge.
frontend/src/components/kyc/DocumentSign: Canvas-based overlay allowing users to draw a signature on top of an uploaded document image.
Provides the main application layout with navigation, sidebar, mobile menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileBot: Bottom mobile navigation bar for quick access to key app routes.
frontend/src/components/payout/NigerianB: Searchable dropdown component for selecting Nigerian banks using a popover and command UI.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for creating a basic user profile with name input and API submission.
frontend/src/components/services/BillCat: Clickable tile component displaying a service category with icon and label.
frontend/src/config/__tests__/nigerianBa: Empty test file placeholder for Nigerian bank configuration.
frontend/src/config/betting.ts: Defines betting providers and preset amount chips for betting services.
frontend/src/config/esimPlans.ts: Exports eSIM plan definitions including pricing, regions, and data amounts.
frontend/src/config/finance.ts: Provides conversion config and a function to compute gross, fee, and net conversion amounts.
frontend/src/config/giftCardBrandCatalog: Defines the GiftCardBrand interface and a catalog of gift card brands with icons, plus helpers for filtering and a generic icon.
frontend/src/config/giftCardRatesNGN.ts: Provides NGN rate tables for gift cards, brand overrides, and utilities to match tiers and format rate labels.
frontend/src/config/nigerianBanks.ts: Exports a list of Nigerian banks and provides search normalization and filtering utilities.
frontend/src/config/vendors.ts: Defines vendor configs and logic to compute payouts and select the best vendor for a given amount.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardData.ts: Aggregates gift card data and local transactions into dashboard metrics like balance, counts, and recent activity.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureUserRegister: Ensures authenticated users are registered in backend access control, handling retries and transient errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login, logout, and persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketRate.ts: Fetches the crypto market rate index periodically using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationPermis: Provides a hook to detect browser notification support, track permission state, and request notification permission.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationSettin: Manages per‑principal in‑app notification preferences with localStorage persistence and a toggle function.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileSetupSuppre: Stores and retrieves whether a user has dismissed profile-setup prompts using localStorage, with suppress/unsuppress helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks and mapping helpers for fetching and transforming user profiles, KYC data, withdrawals, and related backend entities.
frontend/src/hooks/useRateAlertsEngine.t: Runs a periodic rate‑alert engine that checks user alerts, triggers notifications or toasts, logs calendar events, and applies throttling.
Fetches backend sell‑quote data for gift cards and provides a payout‑calculation mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletSummary.ts: Returns the current user's primary wallet balance and currency using their profile query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and color variables for light/dark themes plus utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class merging, currency formatting, and date formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root and wraps it with query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGiftCardRa: Admin interface to create, edit, toggle, and list gift card rates with coin price index integration.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminKycReviewP: Admin UI for searching users and reviewing KYC records, allowing status updates and document/signature viewing.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWithdrawal: Displays pending withdrawal requests and lets admins approve or reject them with status updates.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the dashboard UI with balance display, shortcuts, and loading skeletons using dashboard data.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/__tests__/a: Empty test file placeholder for NGN rate summary tests.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/addGiftCard: Provides a helper to compute the NGN rate tier for a brand and amount using configured rate tables.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/AddGiftCard: Form for creating a new gift card with brand, currency, amount, code, and image upload.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardDet: Shows detailed gift card info, image, rates, and lets admins toggle availability or archive status.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardsLi: Lists all gift cards with optional label filtering and a button to add new cards.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/HottestCard: Displays gift cards ranked by best NGN rates, showing loading skeletons and navigation to add or view cards.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/hottestCard: Ranks gift cards by best NGN rate using rate tables with deterministic sorting and helper rate computation.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/SellGiftCar: Handles selling a specific gift card by fetching quotes, calculating payout, validating input, and submitting transactions.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays a list of locally stored transactions with live updates and navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/KycPage.tsx: Handles KYC submission including document upload, signature capture, validation, and status-based form behavior.
frontend/src/pages/RateAlertsPage.tsx: Manages creation, toggling, and deletion of user rate alerts with notification permission handling.
frontend/src/pages/RateCalendarPage.tsx: Renders a monthly calendar showing user-specific rate events with navigation and date selection.
Renders an airtime purchase form with provider selection, phone input, quick amounts, and local transaction creation.
Allows users to top up betting accounts by selecting a provider, entering details, and saving a local transaction.
frontend/src/pages/services/BillsPage.ts: Shows a grid of bill payment categories and navigates to specific service pages.
frontend/src/pages/services/CableTvBills: Form page for entering smartcard number and amount to create a pending cable TV bill transaction; feature marked as coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/services/CryptoWallet: Crypto wallet dashboard showing mock token balances, activity, and sheets for sending, receiving, buying, swapping, and bank transfers.
frontend/src/pages/services/DataPage.tsx: Form page for purchasing mobile data by phone number and amount, creating a pending data transaction; feature marked as coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/services/ElectricityP: Form page for entering meter number and amount to create a pending electricity bill transaction; feature marked as coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/services/EsimPage.tsx: UI for browsing, searching, and ordering eSIM plans, generating pending eSIM transactions when selected.
frontend/src/pages/services/WifiInternet: Form page for paying internet bills using an account ID and amount, generating a pending wifi transaction; feature marked as coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides notification settings and authentication information tied to Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/withdrawals/Withdrawa: React page for creating withdrawal requests and viewing history, including KYC checks, form handling, and method selection.
frontend/src/state/localTransactions.ts: Manages local transaction records in localStorage with functions to read, add, and clear them.
frontend/src/state/notificationSettingsS: Handles per-principal notification settings in localStorage with functions to get and set a boolean flag.
frontend/src/state/rateAlertsStorage.ts: Provides CRUD operations for per-principal rate alerts stored in localStorage, including toggle and trigger timestamp updates.
frontend/src/state/rateCalendarStorage.t: Manages per-principal calendar events in localStorage with functions to list, add, and delete events.
frontend/src/types/app-types.ts: Defines TypeScript data structures for user profiles, wallets, transactions, KYC, payout methods, withdrawals, and local transactions.
frontend/src/types/process-env.d.ts: Declares TypeScript types for environment variables used by the frontend build system.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrorMessage.t: Utility to extract user-friendly error messages from various backend error shapes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/src/utils/withdrawalProcessingW: Computes withdrawal timing phases and labels based on elapsed time since creation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Sets up Vite with React, path aliasing, environment variable shims, build chunking, dev server proxying, and dependency optimization.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature lists, and pending feature requests for managing withdrawal timing rules and related UI updates.
